enchantment.rinvenium.rush.desc:
While crouching, the Envinium Spear will consume hunger to recharge itself, 
allowing the user to rush forward at great speeds on right-click.
desc.spear.unenchanted_1: Holding right-click allows the Envinium Spear to parry attacks,
desc.spear.unenchanted_2: knocking entities back and damaging them.
desc.spear.enchanted_1: While crouching, the Envinium Spear will consume hunger to recharge itself,
desc.spear.enchanted_2: allowing the user to rush forward at great speeds on right-click.
